hero.subtitle: Get AI-powered pesticide recommendations tailored to your crops and fight plant diseases effectively. Browse our catalog for the best solutions.
hero.imageAlt: Lush green field under a clear sky

cropSuggester.title: Pesticide Recommendations
cropSuggester.description: Select your crop and describe the problem to get AI-powered pesticide suggestions.
cropSuggester.problemDescriptionPlaceholder: e.g., leaves have yellow spots, pests are eating the fruits...
cropSuggester.problemDescriptionHint: Describe the symptoms or pests you are observing.
cropSuggester.noSuggestionsDescription: We couldn't find any pesticide suggestions for the given problem and crop. Please try modifying your description.
cropSuggester.errorFetching: An error occurred while fetching suggestions. Please try again.

productCatalog.title: Pesticide Product Catalog
productCatalog.description: Explore our wide range of pesticide products. Find detailed information including application instructions and target crops.
productCatalog.noProductsFoundDescription: Your search and filter criteria did not match any products. Try adjusting your filters.

diseaseStats.title: Prevalent Disease Insights
diseaseStats.description: Stay informed about the most common plant diseases currently affecting crops.
diseaseStats.noDataDescription: We are currently unable to fetch disease statistics. Please check back later.

plantDiseaseIdentifier.title: Plant Disease Identifier
plantDiseaseIdentifier.description: Upload an image of your plant or use your webcam to get an AI-powered disease diagnosis and treatment suggestions.
plantDiseaseIdentifier.uploadHint: PNG, JPG, WEBP up to 5MB. For best results, use a clear image of the affected plant area.
plantDiseaseIdentifier.descriptionPlaceholder: e.g., yellow spots on leaves, wilting, pests observed...
plantDiseaseIdentifier.noPlantDetected: The image does not appear to contain a plant, or the plant is not clearly visible for analysis.
plantDiseaseIdentifier.noDiseaseDetected: No specific disease was identified. The plant appears healthy or symptoms are not clear enough for diagnosis from the image.
plantDiseaseIdentifier.errorFetching: An error occurred while diagnosing the plant. Please try again later.
plantDiseaseIdentifier.errorNoImage: Please upload or capture an image before submitting for diagnosis.
plantDiseaseIdentifier.webcamError: Error accessing webcam. Please ensure permissions are granted and no other app is using the camera.
plantDiseaseIdentifier.webcamNotSupported: Webcam is not supported or not found on your device.
plantDiseaseIdentifier.cameraAccessRequiredDescription: Please allow camera access in your browser settings to use this feature.

validation.problemDescriptionMinLength: Problem description must be at least 10 characters.
